LanguageData.FTC_CitadelWall.label: Citadel wall
LanguageData.FTC_CitadelWall.description: An impassable wall which offers excellent protection during a siege, designed for industrial fortress structures. Capable of holding up a roof.\n\n This is a permanent structure, place it wisely.
LanguageData.FTC_CitadelWall_Embrasure.label: Citadel embrasure
LanguageData.FTC_CitadelWall_Embrasure.description: An impassable wall which offers excellent protection during a siege, designed for industrial fortress structure. Capable of holding up a roof.\n\n This is a permanent structure, place it wisely.
